animeTitle: Super Robot Wars OG Divine Wars
otherNames: スーパーロボット大戦OG -ディバイン・ウォーズ-
synopsis: Robot bugs suddenly attack Tokyo and robot gamer Ryusei is given a real, mechanical robot trooper to see whether he is a qualified fighter in a war which he has just now become a part of. Amazingly the controls to the personal trooper are just as in the game.
